Day 1 of the Nintendo Treehouse: Live | Nintendo Switch 2 continues: https://ninten.do/6010qS0Gu
NaN
Who’s playing ?!?
This is amazing
Drop the prices you fucks.

No OLED, $80 Games , ...

What's the next step in the Metroid series?

Charging players per area unlocked in a Metroid game?

Charging players per weapon or power-up acquired?
the ergonomics of this don't look good to me.

Running, shooting with no impact. Plain virtual, and flat graphics. 
Back again in 2025. But for $80 now.
